articles.title: Mumbai Monorail With 400 Passengers Breaks Down Amid Heavy Rain
articles.description: A monorail train in Mumbai broke down due to overcrowding and power failure amidst heavy rainfall, stranding hundreds of passengers. This occurred as Mumbai experienced significant flooding and disruptions due to continuous heavy rains, with some areas receiving over 200-300 mm of rainfall in 24 hours.

articles.title: Trump rules out sending US ground troops to Ukraine and warns Putin of 'rough situation' if he does not move towards peace â€“ live
articles.description: Following meetings with European leaders and Ukrainian President Zelenskyy, Donald Trump has ruled out sending US ground troops to Ukraine, while also warning Russian President Putin of a "rough situation" if he doesn't pursue peace. Discussions also involved potential security guarantees for Ukraine and the broader geopolitical landscape.
